thread.title: BRIEF-Aimia Says Qtrly Adjusted Net Earnings Per Common Share From Continuing Operations $0.25

title: BRIEF-Aimia Says Qtrly Adjusted Net Earnings Per Common Share From Continuing Operations $0.25
text:
April 27, 2018 / 7:16 AM / in 2 hours BRIEF-Aimia Says Qtrly Adjusted Net Earnings Per Common Share From Continuing Operations $0.25 Reuters Staff
April 27 (Reuters) - Aimia Inc: * REAFFIRMS 2018 GUIDANCE
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $0.06
* ON TRACK TO ACHIEVE $70 MILLION COST SAVINGS TARGET IN 2019
* QTRLY ADJUSTED NET EARNINGS PER COMMON SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $0.25
* COMPANY BELIEVES THAT IT WILL NOT BE IN A POSITION TO DECLARE OR PAY DIVIDENDS IN 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
